2:
Let Israel rejoice in the one who made them;\q let the people of Zion rejoice in their king.
\q
3:
Let them praise his name with dancing;\q let them sing praises to him with tambourine and harp.


\q
4:
For Yahweh takes pleasure in his people;\q he glorifies the humble with salvation.
\q
5:
Let the godly rejoice in victory;\q let them sing for joy on their beds.


\q
6:
May the praises of God be in their mouths\q and a two-edged sword in their hand
\q
7:
to execute vengeance on the nations\q and acts of punishment on the peoples.


\q
8:
They will bind their kings with chains\q and their nobles with iron shackles.
\q
9:
They will execute the judgment that is written.\q This will be an honor for all his faithful ones.
\q Praise Yahweh.
